channel.title: Help!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @jabezxa jabezxa
item.description:
@jabezxa wrote:

I’m using a 508 source Oh and its only the last item that does it bro.

[quote=“erde0, post:2, topic:365617”][quote author=jabezxa link=topic=461820.msg3378435#msg3378435 date=1287834466]
When i click an item to find out its value in a shop it disconnects me, and even other plays if they click it too!
Helpfull information
my shop code is

public int[] shop5 = {11724, 11726, 11728, 11718, 11720, 11722, 11335, 1121, 4087, 1187, 11283, -1, -1, -1}; public int[] shop5n = {10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10,1,1,1,1,1,1,1}; public int[] shop5p = {40000000, 40000000, 5000000, 40000000, 60000000, 60000000, 23000000, 25000000, 7000000, 30000000, 0, 0, 0};

I did try this aswell

public int[] shop5 = {11724, 11726, 11728, 11718, 11720, 11722, 11335, 1121, 4087, 1187, 11283}; public int[] shop5n = {10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10}; public int[] shop5p = {40000000, 40000000, 5000000, 40000000, 60000000, 60000000, 23000000, 25000000, 7000000, 30000000};

Any help would be appreciated. oh and if you could how do i remove doors? You don’t have answer but it would be nice. VERY NICE! thanks - jabez
[/quote]
You kinda messed up the whole shop. Are you using 562? If so. remove these lines

public int[] shop5p = {40000000, 40000000, 5000000, 40000000, 60000000, 60000000, 23000000, 25000000, 7000000, 30000000, 0, 0, 0};

AND

public int[] shop5p = {40000000, 40000000, 5000000, 40000000, 60000000, 60000000, 23000000, 25000000, 7000000, 30000000, 0, 0, 0};

Also remove the -1 ones.

In 562 the prices are in Data > Items > then in one of the cfg files in there.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @erde0 erde0
item.description:
@erde0 wrote:

[quote=“jabezxa, post:1, topic:365617”]When i click an item to find out its value in a shop it disconnects me, and even other plays if they click it too!
Helpfull information
my shop code is

public int[] shop5 = {11724, 11726, 11728, 11718, 11720, 11722, 11335, 1121, 4087, 1187, 11283, -1, -1, -1}; public int[] shop5n = {10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10,1,1,1,1,1,1,1}; public int[] shop5p = {40000000, 40000000, 5000000, 40000000, 60000000, 60000000, 23000000, 25000000, 7000000, 30000000, 0, 0, 0};

I did try this aswell

public int[] shop5 = {11724, 11726, 11728, 11718, 11720, 11722, 11335, 1121, 4087, 1187, 11283}; public int[] shop5n = {10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10}; public int[] shop5p = {40000000, 40000000, 5000000, 40000000, 60000000, 60000000, 23000000, 25000000, 7000000, 30000000};

Any help would be appreciated. oh and if you could how do i remove doors? You don’t have answer but it would be nice. VERY NICE! thanks - jabez[/quote]
You kinda messed up the whole shop. Are you using 562? If so. remove these lines

public int[] shop5p = {40000000, 40000000, 5000000, 40000000, 60000000, 60000000, 23000000, 25000000, 7000000, 30000000, 0, 0, 0};

AND

public int[] shop5p = {40000000, 40000000, 5000000, 40000000, 60000000, 60000000, 23000000, 25000000, 7000000, 30000000, 0, 0, 0};

Also remove the -1 ones.

In 562 the prices are in Data > Items > then in one of the cfg files in there.
